title: about me
summary: I create engaging digital experiences oriented towards learning and exploration.  I've been professionally trained in research, teaching, and full-stack software development - skills which I use daily for UX/UI design. Previously, I taught university courses, worked at a dating abuse hotline, and created zines. You can often find me picking up new skills through short courses or personal projects.
quote: whatever you pay attention to grows
tagline: currently working on: game development and motion graphic design
